definition_en: Used as the object of a verb or preposition referring to the speaker.
Used to refer to the person the speaker is addressing informally.
Used to refer to the person the speaker is addressing formally.
Used as the object referring to a male person or animal.
Used as the object referring to a female person or animal.
Used to refer to the speaker and another person as the object.
Used as the object to refer to multiple people being addressed.
Used to refer to multiple people or things (masculine/mixed).
Used to refer to multiple female people or things.
